document_data.name: Tyana Softfoot
document_data.mainbody: '''Tyana Softfoot''' was the leader of the [[thieves' guild]] in [[Zhentil Keep]] in [[1373 DR]].
document_data.Activities: Tyana led the guild for mutual survival and propagation of her trade. She was an able strategist and tactician and her primary goal was survival. She was a lifelong resident of Zhentil Keep and knew the lay of the land well.
document_data.History: In 1373 DR, Tyana allied her guild with the [[Handful of Coins]] merchants, gaining much wealth. However, she was ready to abandon them when the [[Zhentarim]] would act against the Coins.
